main_text: We meet on the first Saturday of the month, at 9:00 AM We hold our Monthly Meetings in the Community Room at the Maricopa PD Copper Sky Substation. The Copper Sky Substation houses the MPD Communications Center, as well as the city's Emergency Operations Center. It is a secure facility, so it is recommended that you check in on the repeater before you arrive. Please do not block any driveways. If the lot is full, there is parking available in the Copper Sky complex center.
ve_testing_notification_text: Remember: VE Testing is available at all MARA Meetings. Just let us know in advance so we can bring the materials.
